title: Dame Lillard vs. Neil Olshey, NBA Quarter-Season Awards | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Wos dive into rumors and reports following former general manager Neil Olshey's firing by the Portland Trail Blazers (03:00). Later, the guys give out awards for the first quarter of the season, including Rookie of the Year, MVP, Most Improved, and more (25:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Wosny Lambre
Production Assistant: Jonathan Kermah
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
